00010 /* Purpose: Defines basic defrule primitive functions such   */
00011 /*   as allocating and deallocating, traversing, and finding */
00012 /*   defrule data structures.                                */
00013 /*                                                           */
00014 /* Principal Programmer(s):                                  */
00015 /*      Gary D. Riley                                        */
00016 /*                                                           */
00017 /* Contributing Programmer(s):                               */
00018 /*      Brian L. Dantes                                      */
00019 /*                                                           */
00020 /* Revision History:                                         */
00021 /*                                                           */
00022 /*      6.24: Removed DYNAMIC_SALIENCE and                   */
00023 /*            LOGICAL_DEPENDENCIES compilation flags.        */
00024 /*                                                           */
00025 /*            Renamed BOOLEAN macro type to intBool.         */
00026 /*                                                           */
00027 /*      6.30: Added support for hashed alpha memories.       */
00028 /*                                                           */
00029 /*            Added additional developer statistics to help  */
00030 /*            analyze join network performance.              */
00031 /*                                                           */
00032 /*            Added salience groups to improve performance   */
00033 /*            with large numbers of activations of different */
00034 /*            saliences.                                     */
00035 /*                                                           */
00036 /*************************************************************/

00077 struct defrule
00078   {
00079    struct constructHeader header;
00080    int salience;
00081    int localVarCnt;
00082    unsigned int complexity      : 11;
00083    unsigned int afterBreakpoint :  1;
00084    unsigned int watchActivation :  1;
00085    unsigned int watchFiring     :  1;
00086    unsigned int autoFocus       :  1;
00087    unsigned int executing       :  1;
00088    struct expr *dynamicSalience;
00089    struct expr *actions;
00090    struct joinNode *logicalJoin;
00091    struct joinNode *lastJoin;
00092    struct defrule *disjunct;
00093   };
